lead_paragraph: The participants from Dnepropetrovsk had hoped to help mend a rift between President Petro O. Poroshenko and the regional governor he fired.

headline.main: Residents in Eastern Ukraine City Rally Against Separatism
headline.print_headline: Residents in Eastern Ukraine City Rally Against Separatism

snippet: The participants from Dnepropetrovsk had hoped to help mend a rift between President Petro O. Poroshenko and the regional governor he fired.
